text:
<@UQERM7BLY> HubSpot also got back to me on the backup encryption, this is their response:

I would refer to section - 4.3.3 ENCRYPTION IN-TRANSIT & AT-REST of ourÂ <https://bitli.pro/10kSa_2f9d1e8e|Security Overview Documentation>. It outlines the at-rest encryption which does also apply to our backups.

Hi All,

Do we have a multi site functionality in HubSpot ?
i m aware that wordpress is providing it but i m not sure about HubSpot
can you help me to gain more knowledge ?
yes, with Enterprise you can have multiple URL's then you can use the CMS to build multiple sites and manage them all from one HS instance
